Uses of Class
org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing.CalendarWindows.DaysWindows

  • Packages that use CalendarWindows.DaysWindows 
    Package Description
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing
    Defines the Window transform for dividing the elements in a PCollection into windows, and the Trigger for controlling when those elements are output.

    • Uses of CalendarWindows.DaysWindows in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing

      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing that return CalendarWindows.DaysWindows 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CalendarWindows.DaysWindows CalendarWindows.days(int number)
      Returns a WindowFn that windows elements into periods measured by days.
      static CalendarWindows.DaysWindows CalendarWindows.weeks(int number, int startDayOfWeek)
      Returns a WindowFn that windows elements into periods measured by weeks.
      CalendarWindows.DaysWindows CalendarWindows.DaysWindows.withStartingDay(int year, int month, int day) 
      CalendarWindows.DaysWindows CalendarWindows.DaysWindows.withTimeZone(org.joda.time.DateTimeZone timeZone)
